title: Holiday Stories Redux #1 (CRE1113)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! Our first look back at some of our favorite Yuletide tales from the podcast, as well as a few mini-stories from RISK! fans.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Otis Redding, Amber, Kymra, Kerrie, Rahsaan Roland Kirk, Kevin Bohl, The Raveonettes, Monte Lamonte, Sarah Long Hendershot, Bahamas, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr, Michele Carlo)
